version_description:
-Fixed a bug where old, completed locations would unlock (and nothing would happen when sending survivors there)
-Minor bug fixes
-Added daily reward!

A mysterious mist has brought new arrivals to Tinker Island!
Monsters from myth, folklore and legends have claimed the island for themselves!
Don't go down without a fight! Fight and collect all the fabulous creatures!
- Tinker Hunt: Hunt down and fight more than 30 fantasy creatures and collect their trophies
- New Value Pack with the beloved Pro Wrestler The Boulder
- Collect the new Predator Mech, Cyborg Survivor and the amazing Whirly Spinner
- Bugfixes upon bugfixes
Bug Fixes

- 6 more mythic beings for you to capture! Beware, these are super dangerous!
- New Location with an epic story: The Tangle!
- Many long timers were shortened.
- Bugfixes. All the time.
Bug Fix causing some crashes during Tinker Garden

Your survivors decided to open up a shop!
Collect the right currency to buy the super rare items in the pawn shop
- Three new locations: A survivors shop and means to get currency for it
- Tinker Hunt: 3 new and strange monster added
- Bugfix mayhem

The survivors are off to the fish races!
Take part in fish racing, bet on your champion and win prizes!
- A brand new location
- Many new items in the survivor pawn shop
- Bugfixes
Minor bug fixes

Even Tinker Island isnâ€™t immune to the world beyond. Halloween has hit the island hard! Will you be able to solve the mystery in time?
Halloween Island: A separate isle with new locations, story and fights
Solve the Halloween mystery in time and unlock an incredible ally
Minor Bug Fix

The unthinkable has happened! Pirates have landed on Tinker Island!
Challenge them in swashbuckling, walking the plank and other skullduggery
- Visit the pirate ship that returns every couple of days
- Beat the pirates in their own game and earn terrific rewards
- Build a new seafaring mech
- Piece together the pirate map to get their fabled treasure
- Added Russian language
Fixed a crash for some users

Santa has been sighted over the island. He brings good news for all survivors!
- Earn holiday stockings, an exclusive holiday resource
- Use holiday stockings to unlock the ELF SURVIVOR
- Get more stockings to upgrade the elf survivor through 10 epic levels

Santa has been sighted over the island. He brings good news for all survivors!
- Earn holiday stockings, an exclusive holiday resource
- Use holiday stockings to unlock the ELF SURVIVOR
- Get more stockings to upgrade the elf survivor through 10 epic levels

The holiday decoration fever has reached Tinker Island too!
There have been several visual improvements to the game:
- Hide interface so you can bask in the glory of your camp
- Fights look much more epic
- Helpful interface animations
- Unlocking stuff is visually super rewarding
- Lots of pretty particles

Holidays are over and it's back to serious survival on Tinker Island:
- Hanging out on the island is much more pleasant with some cool new music
- Rebalancing of stories, locations and fights
- Garden and winter garden levels tweaks

Holidays are over and it's back to serious survival on Tinker Island:
- Hanging out on the island is much more pleasant with some cool new music
- Rebalancing of stories, locations and fights
- Garden and winter garden levels tweaks

Bug fixes
-----
1.4.06
Holidays are over and it's back to serious survival on Tinker Island:
- Hanging out on the island is much more pleasant with some cool new music
- Rebalancing of stories, locations and fights
- Garden and winter garden levels tweaks

- Steam engine can now also be activated by watching ads!
- Labor production problems fixed
- Performance improvements
- Other bugfixes

Bug fixes

- Hanging out on the island is much more pleasant with some cool new music
- Rebalancing of stories, locations and fights
- Garden and winter garden levels tweaks

- Bugfixes
--- 1.4.06 ---
Holidays are over and it's back to serious survival on Tinker Island:
- Hanging out on the island is much more pleasant with some cool new music
- Rebalancing of stories, locations and fights
- Garden and winter garden levels tweaks

- Steam engine can now also be activated by watching ads!
- Labor production problems fixed
- Performance improvements
- Other bugfixes

- Performance improvements
- Other bugfixes
The animals in the Tangle location have mutated! They now drop Tinker Garden helpers! Explore the Tangle location if you are stuck in Tinker Garden.

Made the game easier to understand for first time players.
Increased reward for watching an ad and fixed a bug where some users did not get +50% of resources after watching an ad.

Made the game easier to understand for first time players.
Increased reward for watching an ad and fixed a bug where some users did not get +50% of resources after watching an ad.
You come across some old castle ruins, protected by an old witch. Can you solve all the witch's riddles to save the Princess from the curse?
You come across some old castle ruins, protected by an old witch. Can you solve all the witch's riddles to save the Princess from the curse?

You come across some old castle ruins, protected by an old witch. Can you solve all the witch's riddles to save the Princess from the curse?
Bugfixes.

Fixed a bug where some players did not receive resources from labor sites.
New survivors and a new set of premium country flags!
Santa has been sighted over the island. He brings good news for all survivors!
- Earn holiday stockings, an exclusive holiday resource
- Use holiday stockings to unlock the ELF SURVIVOR
- Get more stockings to upgrade the elf survivor through 10 epic levels

We're working hard to keep this game running smoothly.
- fixed issues players were experiencing with FB friends
- added VFX to make things more clear
- improved cloud saving

Fixed issues with finding your Facebook friends and Pyramid building causing some users the game to freeze.
We're working hard to make the game run as smooth as silk. This update brings it a step closer.

From the depths of the sea, an ancient building arises. Solve riddles and discover the mysteries of Tinker Temple.
Also fixed a bug happening on slow internet connections.
From the depths of the sea, an ancient building arises. Solve riddles and discover the mysteries of Tinker Temple.

Lots of performance improvements all around.
Have you saved the princess in the castle yet? Or are you still struggling with the wicked witch?

A new island appears right off of Tinker Island: MECH ISLAND!
A whole new island to explore, puzzles to solve and fights to win.
Will you help the villagers or the general? Choose wisely!

Love is in the air on Tinker Island. Will you be able to help your survivor-sweethearts find the one true love?
- Epic Valentine's Day live event
- 4 new survivors, check out the survivor menu

Valentine's is over, back to work!
- perfomance improvements
- various bugfixes
Some of you reported problems when collecting birds in Tinker Garden. We fixed that. And some other bugfixes.

- Performance improvements
- Other bugfixes

- Performance improvements
- Other bugfixes
The game works smoother now. Less hiccups too.

Daily rewards work properly again.
The game works smoother now. Less hiccups too.

Lots of under-the-hood changes happened on Tinker Island. The game should now run more smoothy, watching ads will now work perfectly.
The survivors are getting some super help in form of brand new super hero survivors!
Presenting: Courage Man and Courage Lady! Each hero comes with a special super power, either with a gem mine or a timer reduction. Powerful upgrades indeed!
